title: It's You, It's Me
text:
It's You, It's Me is the debut <a href="studio%20album">studio album</a> by American <a href="House%20music">house</a> <a href="Disc%20jockey">DJ</a> <a href="Kaskade">Kaskade</a>. It was released on March 18, 2003 by <a href="Om%20Records">OM Records</a>.
A deluxe edition of the album was released in March 28, 2013, before Kaskade's "It's You, It's Me Redux" tour. The deluxe album edition contains the full-length original album with tracks and remixes from Kaskade's first four official singles: "What I Say", "Gonna Make It", "I Feel It" and "It's You, It's Me". The nine-city tour commemorates ten years of the album's release by performing in areas similar to where the artist began.
